name: Into the Under Wild (in development)
description: This is a point and click game in development where you play as the apprentice to a witch. Go on a quest to meet interesting characters in the Under Wild, and retrieve items needed for a special potion. Will you survive the dastardly encounters? Will you meet two pretty best friends? Are you going to figure out what the hell a salamander is??? Discover the magical world for yourself in our first prototype.
